Three times / Zui hao de shi guang

Year: 2005
Country: Taiwan
Genre: Romance
Length: 129 minutes

Russian subtitles: yes

Director: Hou Hsiao-hsien / Hou Hsiao-hsien

Starring: Shu Qi and Chang Chen

Description: What time is the best? How wonderful that it can not be returned. We remember him, not because it was perfect, quite the contrary - because it is lost forever, and we can only think of him and that makes it awesome.
Three different times - 1911, 1966, 2005, three stories, the same actor and actress in the film, singing the praises of their love in three different times.

TIME OF LOVE - 1966. A boy and a girl somewhere in the Taiwan backwater fall in love for the pool table.
TIME FOR FREEDOM - 1911. The history of relations of Mr. Chang and courtesans, unfolding against the Japanese occupation of Taiwan.
TIME YOUTH - 2005. The singer and photographer trying to get out of a love triangle.

Extras. Information:
The film was nominated for the Palme d'Or at Cannes in 2005
The film is divided into 2 files - cd1 and cd2
